body.name: Hot Sugar All In One Makeup Set for Adults and Girls - Full Makeup Kit for Beginners With Eye Shadow Palette, Blush, Lip Gloss, Brush, Mirror (Pink Leopard)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 27 mins
features: All-in-One Design: This full cosmetic set, which keeps you from having everything separate, is designed for beginners, makeup artist and enthusiasts. The kit provides basic beauty essentials for you to make a pretty full face makeup.

Compact and Portable: 10.4 x 6.5 x 3.74 inches, for maximum space-saving at home or in your travel bag. With a top handle, it is convenient to carry it to any occasions like parties, theaters, cosplay shows, salon, dance performances. And the colorful mini palettes can be easily picked out and put in your handbag.
Ultimate Color Combinations: Since there are so many selections that are mixes of warm and cool colors, matte and shimmer, you can make fantastic color combinations as many as possible.

What You Get: Makeup and applicators-27 eye shadows, 4 blushes, 2 lip glosses, 4 lipsticks, 10 brushes, 2 lip pencils, 2 eye pencils. A reusable train case with a built-in mirror-It looks fabulous with cute pink leopard leather and can be used to store your cosmetics, makeup tools, jewelry and watches.

Superior Quality Guarantee: The cosmetics are hypoallergenic and paraben-free, so it is safe and will not stimulate your skin. With any problems, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service.
body.description: Features and Benefits: - Hot Sugar full-face makeup kit filled with high quality real cosmetics is essential for your beauty collection. . - Whether you’re gifting to your loved ones, close friends, mother, partner, teenage daughter, niece, granddaughter aged 5-12 or yourself, shop this magical makeup set for guaranteed delight! - This pretty compact and portable cosmetic set is convenient to take to parties, theaters, cosplay shows, salon, dance performances or any other occasions. - Individual mini palettes are easy to take out from the box to use separately. - Each product is formulated with high quality materials, so that the silky items are waterproof and can last all day Long. And they are highly pigmented and easy to layer and blend without stimulating your skin. - The shades ranging from matter to shimmer are blendable and smooth without fallout. - Reusable cute organizer can be used to store your makeup, beauty brushes, makeup tools, applicators, jewelry and watches. - We offer worry-free customer service. With any questions, please contact us without any hesitation. Specifications: - Size & Weight: 10.4 x 6.5 x 3.74 inches, 1.98 pounds; - Fabulous & Lightweight travel size makeup train case in wonderful green leopard; - Portable & Lockable with a top handle and latches; - On top lid: 3pcs brushes and 3pcs dual-side applicators, 2pcs lip pencils, 2pcs eye pencils, 1 built-in mirror; - On 2 trays: 2pcs lip glosses, 4pcs lipsticks, 2pcs 6-color eyeshadow palette (each with 1pc dual-side applicator); - In bottom compartment: 2pcs 6-bright-color eyeshadow palette (each with 1pc dual-side applicator), 4pcs blushes, 3pcs eyeshadow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely makeup kit
reviews.reviewText: Bought this set for my granddaughter and she was over the moon happy with it. The pink case is very nice and the presentation with the lift-up layers is awesome. Everything a young lady could want is in this set. She is happy. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice colors, a perfect Christmas gift

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After reading up on other products of this type I was a bit hesitant to hit "add to cart" but thought that I would give it a try. I was THRILLED with what I received and bought a 2nd one because of it. My grand daughters will love them. Good quality- wonderful variety and a really cute case! HIGHLY recommend!

reviews.reviewText: The case is nice and the makeup is good quality

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make up kit
reviews.reviewText: Daughter got this gift for christmas. There are so many options in this kit. I love that she is able to explore her creative side with make up.
